version_description: Forget about calling us, in-app chat means you can get help from our Care team right from the app.
Minor enhancements
Forget about calling us, in-app chat means you can get help from our Care team right from the app.
Minor enhancements

• You can now get AED79 off your first plan with promo code APP79
• We’ve made some improvements to our wallet and roaming notifications.
• Nobody likes waiting for stuff, so we’ve optimized our loading and usage screens for SPEED.
• UX and design improvements.
• Pest control have removed a few bugs.

• You can now get AED79 off your first plan with promo code APP79
• We’ve made some improvements to our wallet and roaming notifications.
• Nobody likes waiting for stuff, so we’ve optimized our loading and usage screens for SPEED.
• UX and design improvements.
• Pest control have removed a few bugs.

• Picking up a SIM in store and getting it activated at home has never been easier with our latest improvements.
• Improvements to the app sign up process.
• It’s time for spring cleaning, so we got rid of a few bugs.
• General app improvements.

• Picking up a SIM in store and getting it activated at home has never been easier with our latest improvements.
• Improvements to the app sign up process.
• It’s time for spring cleaning, so we got rid of a few bugs.
• General app improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Bigger is better, right? We think so, that’s why we have added 5GB, 7.5GB and 10GB Boosters. Best of all, they’re all available with Double Data!
• We’ve made improvements to our sign-up process. Becoming a customer has never been easier.
• Our app is now faster than ever with the latest round of speed optimisations.
• We identified a few pesky bugs which we swiftly removed.

We found some bugs, so we removed them.
We found some bugs, so we removed them.

• We are always keen to offer you guys flexibility and product options that offer you more value for your money …. so, we’ve decided, based on popular demand, to launch a 6 months plan option and a 12 months plan option. With these longer plan options, you’ll pay for your monthly plan for the selected period (6 or 12 months) in advance and get rewarded with a whopping saving. 30% off on 6 months or 50% off on a 12 months plan to be exact.
 
• How it works:
 
o Select a how much data, mins and international mins you’d like
o Choose the 6 months or 12 months plan option in the same screen
o Enjoy a saving of up to 50%
o Pay your bill for the selected period and enjoy peace of mind
 
• Once you’re done, you can sit back and forget about your plan & we’ll send you a notification when it’s time to change your plan again. Awesome right? 
 
• In case you need more data during the month, you can always use boosters so you remain flexible

• We are always keen to offer you guys flexibility and product options that offer you more value for your money …. so, we’ve decided, based on popular demand, to launch a 6 months plan option and a 12 months plan option. With these longer plan options, you’ll pay for your monthly plan for the selected period (6 or 12 months) in advance and get rewarded with a whopping saving. 30% off on 6 months or 50% off on a 12 months plan to be exact.
 
• How it works:
 
o Select a how much data, mins and international mins you’d like
o Choose the 6 months or 12 months plan option in the same screen
o Enjoy a saving of up to 50%
o Pay your bill for the selected period and enjoy peace of mind
 
• Once you’re done, you can sit back and forget about your plan & we’ll send you a notification when it’s time to change your plan again. Awesome right? 
 
• In case you need more data during the month, you can always use boosters so you remain flexible

Bug fixes and general improvements
Bug fixes and general improvements

Based on high demand, we introduced 6 and 12 months plan options that offer you a significant saving of up to 50% with an easy one-time payment.

How it works:
- Select how much data, mins and international mins you’d like
- Choose the 6 months or 12 months plan option in the same screen
- Enjoy a saving of up to 50%
- Pay your bill for the selected period and enjoy peace of mind

Once you’re done, you can sit back and forget about your plan & we’ll send you a notification when it’s time to change your plan again. Awesome right?

In case you need more data during the month, you can always use boosters so you remain flexible.

Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements

VERSION 2.4
 
= FEATURES =
• Added a friendly reminder if you have an old version of the app. You don’t want that one, it’s all buggy.
• Started preparations for some awesome new features which are coming soon ^_^
 
= FIXES =
• Great news, double data is now showing on all data boosters. Woohoo!
• Minor bugs with yearly plans, we won’t bore you with the details.
• App crashing when updating your plan. Now you can update your plan to your heart’s desire.
 
We love feedback, ideas and comments! If you have some you’d like to share then drop us a line on feedback@virginmobile.ae.
 
If you’re enjoying the app, don’t forget to leave us a rating and review.

Did you know you can save 50% on your mobile with our yearly plans?

= NEW STUFF =
[+] More flexibility when you pay.
[+] Changing your ID? Now, you can request a driver.
[+] We’ve fixed accidently buying more than one booster.
[+] Something went wrong in the app? That never happens ;) directly chat with us

= STILL COOL = 
[+] Stay connected when you go abroad with roaming.
[+] You can add up to 4 new SIMs to your exiting account.

Love our app? Remember to leave a rating and review. If there’s something you want to share, feel free to drop us a line on feedback@virginmobile.ae.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Every Virgin Mobile customer on a monthly plan of AED 150 or more can now get 3 MONTHS OF NETFLIX ON US! Enjoy Netflix original series, movies and more right at your fingertips. T&Cs apply.

= NEW STUFF =
[+] Choose your wallet or credit card as your preferred payment method.
[+] Manage your internet calling plan directly from the app.

We love feedback! Drop us a line at feedback@virginmobile.ae.
If you’re enjoying the app, don’t forget to leave us a rating and review.

We’re super excited as Apple Pay is here! You can now use the easiest and most secure way to pay for your plan automatically every month, recharge your wallet and even buy boosters and roaming. Another awesome innovative feature!

= NEW STUFF =
[+] Apple Pay is here, an easy and secure way to pay
[+] Added a tutorial screen and a nice new card on the homepage
[+] We’ve scared away some lost skeletons and ghosts
